content: Hello all. Welcome to the July 2021 CMS Connectathon. We will use this topic to communicate during the event. The track page can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/CMS2021-07+Gravity+SDOH+Exchange

Hi Corey. I received invites for the Gravity - SDOH - Logica Sandboxes (3). I am trying to register but having difficulty in getting the confirmation email to verify my email address. Is there someone that can help me? Thank you.

Nevermind Corey, I was able to re-submit and get registered.

Where can I find a list of the SDOH codes that were submitted to be added to ICD-10-CM, SNOMED-CT, LOINC standards? Bob Dieterle provided: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/GRAV/SDOH+Data+Elements+And+Status
